mapper.insert: insert into t_menu (name, linkUrl, path, priority, icon, description, parentMenuId, level) values (#{name}, #{linkUrl}, #{path}, #{priority}, #{icon}, #{description}, #{parentMenuId}, #{level})
mapper.select: SELECT distinct m.id, m.name title, m.linkUrl, m.path, m.priority, m.icon, m.parentMenuId FROM t_user_role ur JOIN t_role r ON ur.`role_id` = r.`id` JOIN t_role_menu rm ON r.`id` = rm.`role_id` JOIN t_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.`id` WHERE ur.`user_id` = (select id from t_user where username = #{username})
